column4: Hi everbody, how can I turnoff the Ubuntu Bip Sound? I mean when I press a wrong key this BIP sound playin...
go to System>Preferences>Sound and go to the System Beep tab... disable that.
tnx but can u tell me which of these?
ahan I got it
ok :)
thank u so much
np
I have a question about irssi console for IRC, I do sudo apt-get install irssi , but I cant find it in my Ubuntu
have you tried opening a terminal and typing irssi?
can u explain me more?
ahaan :)) I got it again
go to Applications>Accessories>Terminal and type irssi and hit enter at the prompt
tnx again
how I can register a channel in freenode?
you can join and create any channel... but you need to learn how to use chanserv to properly set it up.
did you not read my answer?
sry i didnt see
can u plz tell me again :( sry
just joining the channel will create it, but you need to learn how to use chanserv correctly to properly "register" it.
type /msg chanserv help for help.
tnx so much
